General.Name: Grand House Mulia Pt
General.Description: PT Grand House Mulia Tbk develops residential and commercial properties in Indonesia. It also owns and leases real estate properties; and operates three-star hotels, as well as offers property development consulting services. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Bogor, Indonesia. PT Grand House Mulia Tbk is a subsidiary of Pt Graha Mulia Indotama.
